site_name: Valour Court, 15 Hewer Street W10 6DU and Courage Court, 17 Hewer Street, London W10 6DX
description: Verification Order required to amend the street addresses, the number of residential units and the numbering of the residential units at Valour Court, 15 Hewer Street W10 6DU and Courage Court, 17 Hewer Street, London W10 6DX, linked to Joint Decision and Verification Order SNN/22/02829, as follows:The addresses - Flats 1-9, Valour Court, 15 Hewer Street, London W10 6DU - to be deleted.New addresses to be known as:Flat A, Ground Floor, 15 Hewer Street, London W10 6DUFlat B, Ground Floor, 15 Hewer Street, London W10 6DUFlat C, Ground Floor, 15 Hewer Street, London W10 6DUFlat D, Ground Floor, 15 Hewer Street, London W10 6DUFlat E, First Floor, 15 Hewer Street, London W10 6DUFlat F, First Floor, 15 Hewer Street, London W10 6DUFlat G, First Floor, 15 Hewer Street, London W10 6DUFlat H, First Floor, 15 Hewer Street, London W10 6DUFlat I, First Floor, 15 Hewer Street, London W10 6DUFlat J, Second Floor, 15 Hewer Street, London W10 6DUFlat K, Second Floor, 15 Hewer Street, London W10 6DUFlat L, Second Floor, 15 Hewer Street, London W10 6DUThe addresses - Flats 1-11, Courage Court, 17 Hewer Street, London W10 6DX - to be deleted.New addresses to be known as:Flat A, Ground Floor, 17 Hewer Street, London W10 6DXFlat B, Ground Floor, 17 Hewer Street, London W10 6DXFlat C, Ground Floor, 17 Hewer Street, London W10 6DXFlat D, First Floor, 17 Hewer Street, London W10 6DXFlat E, First Floor, 17 Hewer Street, London W10 6DXFlat F, First Floor, 17 Hewer Street, London W10 6DXFlat G, Second and Third Floor, 17 Hewer Street, London W10 6DXFlat H, Second and Third Floor, 17 Hewer Street, London W10 6DX
